title: Pool Party Graves Crit Bug
body: When Pool Party {{champion:104}}  crits there is a big blue flash following his autos. It is really bright/annoying to see. Thought I'd let Rito know :P

replies.body:
Hey ThePopGuy,

Thanks for the report! This appears to be affecting the champion itself rather than just the skin. We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it. :]
